name: Lumysa
description:
Lumysa is an arcade wave survival game, in 2D side view, made with "Construct2".

You play as a rabbit in a fixed camera level and must survive against infinite waves of enemies. There is several enemies, all with their own specialities, that wll spawn on differents edges of the screen. The game begin slow and with time, enemies will spawn faster and drop fun new guns to use.

You can use a strange power to inverse gravity and help you evade against too many enemies or some invincible when they are on the same level as you. One special enemy can only be defeated by shooting on top of his head, pay attention to him.

Enjoy this infinite survival game and try your best to keep your rabbit colourful and alive! Good luck!

_______________________________________________________________

VICTORY CONDITIONS:

  • None, you mst survive the longest possible and reach the best score you can before losing all your hearts

HOW TO SCORE A POINT:

  • Kill an enemy

_______________________________________________________________

CONTROLS (only keyboard and mouse):

  • LeftMouseClick to shoot
  • Q & D to move
  • R to reload
  • Spacebar to inverse gravity

_______________________________________________________________

Made by Bédu Louis, Mélanie Bourgogne and Hugo Giovannetti, students in Game Design at ICAN, Paris, in only 3 months, when doing my first year of studies!
